dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, like, isn't it amazing how much development is happening in Kazakhstan? Another airport, uh, for Arkalyk.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, like, isn't it amazing how much development is happening in Kazakhstan? Another airport, uh, for Arkalyk.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Amazing? No, I mean, is it really another airport, or is it just, you know, more of the same old stuff?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Amazing? No, I mean, is it really another airport, or is it just, you know, more of the same old stuff?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: What do you mean "more of the same"? It's a new, uh, two-story terminal, 70 passengers an hour. That's capacity, that's progress.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: What do you mean more of the same? It's a new, uh, two-story terminal, seventy passengers an hour. That's capacity, that's progress.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A two-story terminal complex with a total area of 3,200 square meters and a capacity of 70 passengers per hour is planned.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: But they're also, like, renovating the runway, right? And, uh, wasn't this exact airport listed for sale by a private owner back in 2020?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But they're also, like, renovating the runway, right? And, uh, wasn't this exact airport listed for sale by a private owner back in twenty twenty?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In addition, the 2,500-meter runway will be renovated. ... In 2020, a private owner listed Arkalyk Airport for sale on a classified ads website.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, but that's just, you know, the history. Now the government's taking it seriously. They're funding new equipment. Subsidized flights.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, but that's just, you know, the history. Now the government's taking it seriously. They're funding new equipment. Subsidized flights.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Funds have also been allocated for the purchase of aeronautical and meteorological equipment," Transport Minister Marat Karabayev said... The ministry plans to launch subsidized flights to Kostanay, Astana, and Almaty once construction is completed.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Seriously? They're repurchasing it in December 2024 for 20.7 million tenge. They let it go private, then buy it back. Does that sound serious, or, like, seriously mismanaged?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Seriously? They're repurchasing it in December twenty twenty four for twenty point seven million tenge. They let it go private, then buy it back. Does that sound serious, or, like, seriously mismanaged?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In December 2024, the Kostanay regional akimat (local government administration) repurchased the airport for 20.7 million tenge, returning it to state ownership.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Well, um, sometimes things need to be nationalized, right? Especially critical infrastructure. Tokayev himself, uh, ordered an air hub.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, um, sometimes things need to be nationalized, right? Especially critical infrastructure. Tokayev himself, uh, ordered an air hub.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Earlier, Kassym-Jomart Tokayev ordered the urgent creation of an international air hub in Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: An international air hub. This thing, 70 passengers an hour, in Arkalyk? That's, you know, not exactly O'Hare.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: An international air hub. This thing, seventy passengers an hour, in Arkalyk? That's, you know, not exactly O'Hare.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Earlier, Kassym-Jomart Tokayev ordered the urgent creation of an international air hub in Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: It's a start! It connects Kostanay, Astana, Almaty. That's, uh, important regional connectivity.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's a start! It connects Kostanay, Astana, Almaty. That's, uh, important regional connectivity.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The ministry plans to launch subsidized flights to Kostanay, Astana, and Almaty once construction is completed.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Or it's just, like, a really expensive bus stop they're calling an airport after, uh, selling it off and buying it back.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Or it's just, like, a really expensive bus stop they're calling an airport after, uh, selling it off and buying it back.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: No, it's about the vision! The Ministry of Transport says the project design is nearing completion. They've got a concept.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, it's about the vision! The Ministry of Transport says the project design is nearing completion. They've got a concept.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to the Ministry of Transport, the project design is nearing completion. ... Officials also presented a concept design of the future airport.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: A concept design. For an airport that reporters already, um, visited the 'construction site' of years ago.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A concept design. For an airport that reporters already, um, visited the 'construction site' of years ago.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Previously, Tengrinews.kz reporters visited the construction site and showed its current condition.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: It's new details. Funds allocated. It's happening now.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's new details. Funds allocated. It's happening now.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Funds have also been allocated for the purchase of aeronautical and meteorological equipment,

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Or it's, uh, just happening again.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Or it's, uh, just happening again.
